subject: Order confirmation.
description_text:
Good evening

I responded to an email last week with regards the replacement of 2x vam
modules but have not received a response. Can you please confirm this was
received.

Also.

I have ordered 2x vam pro modules as a gift and have not received
confirmation of order although the funds have been taken from my bank
account.

Can you please advise.

Thanks.

Daniel rodziewicz
Djrodziewicz@gmail.com
1 Yaxley pl, Stoke-on-Trent ST3 3LJ, UK

conversations.body_text: Hi Daniel Rodziewicz,  Sorry for the late reply, here is your tracking link.  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=YT2524700703097046

Thank you. I received the replacement vam modules today.

I was actually asking about the 2x vam pro modules that I have purchased at
the weekend.

The funds have gone from my bank account however I have not received an
email confirmation of the order and tracking.

Can you please advise.

Thank you.
Hi Daniel Rodziewicz,   Please provide the purchase date and exact amount for the VAM Pro, so I can help you check and locate the corresponding order number.

Yes of course. I made the purchase on the 6th of September for 2x vam pro
modules.

The funds went out of my account on the 8th September for £72.80 (i think I
used a discount code)

Was ordered on your website via my email djrodziewicz@gmail.com

Please see below screenshot of transfer.

Thank you.



On Fri, 12 Sept 2025, 05:31 service@simsonn.com,

Hi Daniel Rodziewicz,  I’ve checked your order, and the order number is #SSN2572, with the tracking number SF Express • SF6045901450725. You purchased 2 VAM Pro units, which do not include a power supply.

Thats correct. Thank you for confirming the order.

I look forward to receiving them.

Thank you.

Dan.

On Fri, 12 Sept 2025, 13:49 service@simsonn.com,

Good afternoon.

Im really not happy with the quality of your vam and vam pro modules.

I 1st purchased  3x vam modules that pretty much broke straight away. You
kindly provided replacements.  Thank you.

I then ordered 2x vam pro modules. Arrived over a week ago. Thanks.

Working fine until today.

Now all 3 pedal modules. 2x vam pro and 1x vam are on full power and
constantly on. When unplugging the provided power brick to take power from
the control box im getting "sparks" ... big sparks.

Shut down comp. Power all everything. Unplug.

Restart and exactly the same.

I dont think that this is really acceptable to be honest and the fact the
the black box is throwing sparks out when trying to plug the power into it
doesn't exactly fill me with confidence.

I would like a resolve to this please or I will have to return the items to
simsonn for a full refund as at the moment I have safety and quality
control concerns.

Mr Daniel rodziewicz
1 Yaxley place
Newstead.. Stoke on trent
Staffordshire.
St3 3lj.

Note. Running through simhum at 50% power.

Simsonn software not turned on.

All modules correctly isolated and earthed from brake to rig and baseplate
to rig.

Please advise.

On Fri, 12 Sept 2025, 05:31 service@simsonn.com,

Hi Daniel Rodziewicz,  Please provide the order number of your pedals so I can confirm the exact model. Additionally, make sure to plug the USB cable into a rear USB 3.0 blue port on your computer and avoid using USB hubs. Many USB hubs are of poor quality, which can lead to insufficient power supply or data transmission issues. If the motor continues to run even after being stopped, it usually indicates that the stop command was not properly received. In our own testing environment and with other customers, we have not encountered this issue.
